title: Did New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern Don a Hijab and Offer Aid to Families of Massacre Victims?
subtitle: New Zealand was rocked by grief following a massacre at two mosques perpetrated by a suspected white supremacist.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern wore a hijab and offered financial assistance in support of Christchurch shooting victims.
